00044     @Action
00045     public void showAboutBox() {
00046         if (aboutBox == null) {
00047             JFrame mainFrame = ScheatorApp.getApplication().getMainFrame();
00048             aboutBox = new ScheatorAboutBox(mainFrame);
00049             aboutBox.setLocationRelativeTo(mainFrame);
00050         }
00051         ScheatorApp.getApplication().show(aboutBox);
00052     }
